name: spo-export-site-all-content
title: Export all content from an existing SharePoint site
shortDescription: This script shows how to export all content from an existing SharePoint site
longDescription: This script shows how to export all content from an existing SharePoint site. The script is a subset of the PnPCandy concept (SPO powershell packages with content). Main idea here is to actually migrate content from one site to another . The script will crawl Document libraries, export content to a local folder and prepare a pnptemplate ready to import
